channel.title: Lucas H. Xu
channel.description: Recent content on Lucas H. Xu

item.title: Why Writing a Blog
item.description: Building a great blog is a long-time commitment and it is not an easy one. It is difficult that you do not always know what you would want to write about. In addition, writing in English, which is not my native language, makes the posts not so clear and concise. I consider this is a learning process, which helps me become a better writer. And I also hope to become a better developer by writing my thoughts on coding and programming.

item.title: About
item.description: Lucas graduated from Boston University with a Master of Science degree in Computer Science specialization in Cybersecurity Jan. 2020. After graduation, he joined Facebook as a Production Engineer. He currently lives in Menlo Park, CA. Feel free to connect with him on LinkedIn!

item.title: Projects
item.description: Open-source Projects My Awesome List My Wiki Learn C Learn Java Learn CPP Learn Rust Learn Golang Learn Network Learn Algorithms

item.title: Resume
item.description: To see the full version, please check my Github Resume Repo. Experience Production Engineer at Facebook, Inc (Mar. 2020 - Present) TBD Software Engineer Intern at RedHat, Inc (May 2019 - Dec. 2019) Performance Testing on OpenStack Octavia and Nova Prometheus, Grafana, Graphite, Collectd, Ansible Education Boston University, Sept. 2018 - Jan. 2020 Master of Science, Computer Science specialization in Cybersecurity Boston University, Sept, 2012 - May 2016 Bachelor of Arts, Computer Science Bachelor of Arts, Statistics
